channel.title: Blog posts on Veronica Starovoit
channel.description: Recent content in Blog posts on Veronica Starovoit

item.title: UFO Sightings Data Analytics Presentation
item.description: The following presentation was Veronica’s final project for General Assembly’s Data Analytics certificate. Veronica used a combination of SQL, Excel, and Tableau software to groom data and create graphs. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Amazon Advertising Help Center Metrics (downloads file)
item.description: Veronica created a few reports by cleaning up and graphing raw help center usage data. Regularly reported on data included most used help topics, unique monthly users, user characteristics, and where users accessed the help center. All graphs were created in Excel and data was pulled via SQL queries. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Amazon Promotion Document
item.description: Veronica presented the following document as evidence for a promotion from L5 Tech Writer to L6 Sr. Tech Writer at Amazon, which she got. In it, she describes key achievements and provides positive peer and customer feedback. PDF can’t be displayed :(
